prompt: Write down everything you spent money on in the last 3 days. Divide into categories such as Food, Transportation, Shopping, Others. Then answer: Which category is the largest, what surprised you, and write one-line insight.

Write your height, weight, and goal (lose weight, maintain, gain muscle). Ask AI to generate a simple one-day meal plan. Reflect on what rule the system seemed to use, what you would change, and write one-line insight.
Take a 20-minute walk in a nearby park or green area. After walking, write how you felt, what you noticed, and one-line insight.
Choose a city and create a simple one-day travel plan (morning, afternoon, evening) with a rough budget estimate. Reflect on what constraint shaped your plan and write one-line abstraction.
Design a simple science experiment using water, a cup, and a paper towel. Explain what it demonstrates (cause-effect) and write one-line insight about what a child would learn.
Choose a new hobby and create a short Amazon shopping list to start. Explain why each item is needed, then write one-line system insight about how you prioritized essentials.
Create a simple 3-day beginner workout plan (Day 1, Day 2, Day 3). Identify where feedback exists (how you know to adjust) and write one-line reflection.
Create a simple daily study plan for tomorrow. Include 3 tasks, estimated time for each, and one break. Reflect on how you chose priorities and write one-line insight.
Pick any YouTube topic you are curious about. Turn it into a mini learning module with 3 sections (beginner, example, summary). Write one-line abstraction of what the module teaches.
Design a simple everyday tech tool idea (for example: study timer, expense tracker, habit reminder). Define its input, output, and feedback loop in plain language, then write one-line insight.
Why do popular movies often follow similar story structures? Explain using the idea of narrative patterns.
What were three major consequences of the Industrial Revolution? Explain each briefly.
Why do some animals migrate long distances? Explain at least two biological or environmental reasons.
What is the difference between short-term motivation and long-term discipline? Explain how each affects personal growth.
What is confirmation bias? Give one everyday example and explain why it matters.
What is one key difference between AI systems and traditional rule-based programming? Explain in simple terms.
How do forests help reduce global warming? Explain at least two mechanisms.
Why is grammar helpful in communication? Explain without using technical jargon.
What is inflation, and what are two common causes of it?
Why do many religions include daily rituals? Explain the psychological or social purpose behind them.
